mapper.select:
/* 메인 배너 리스트 조회 쿼리 */
select banner_no as bannerNo , expose_order as exposeOrder , file_path as filePath , file_name as fileName , date_format(reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as regDt , date_format(mod_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as modDt from web_app_test2.tb_main_banner_img where use_yn = 'y'

/* 유저 타입 조회 쿼리 */
select user_type_no as userTypeNo , type as userType from web_app_test2.tb_user_type where use_yn = 'y' and type != 'SUPER_ADMIN'
